# pomerium_external_data_source (Resource)

External Data Source for Pomerium.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `foreign_key` (String) The key referenced for policy evaluation. E.g. user.id.
- `record_type` (String) How the queried records will be stored in the databroker.
- `url` (String) The URL to query for data.

### Optional

- `allow_insecure_tls` (Boolean) Ignores TLS errors from the external data source.
- `client_tls_key_id` (String) The key pair used for TLS to the external data source.
- `cluster_id` (String) The cluster ID for the external data source.
- `headers` (Map of String) Request headers sent to the external data source.
- `polling_max_delay` (String) The maximum amount of time to wait before polling again.
- `polling_min_delay` (String) The minimum amount of time to wait before polling again.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the external data source.
